amendment.description: An amendment to decrease the amount provided for Wildland Fire Management by $1,000,000.
amendment.purpose: Amendment increases and then decreases the amount provided for Wildland Fire Management by $1 million in order to apply additional funds to the Volunteer Fire Assistance grant program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Polis.
